snippet.title: Pie-Man for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Pie-Man puts you in the role of a pie baker. Pies are coming out of the conveyor belt and you have to put cream and cherries on them, and take them to the pie storage room, before they fall down from the conveyor belt.

Be aware of the other pie baker. If he touches you you will lose whatever you are currently carrying.

Also be aware of stuff that is lying on the floor.


What I think:

This game is insanely addictive, but certainly lacks a lot of challenge.
